LanguageData.XMonsters_MediocreAccuracy.label: mediocre shooting accuracy
LanguageData.XMonsters_MediocreAccuracy.description:
Carriers of this gene have mediocre accuracy.

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>

This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_AwfulAccuracy.label: awful shooting accuracy
LanguageData.XMonsters_AwfulAccuracy.description:
Carriers of this gene have awful accuracy.

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>

This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.

Carriers of this gene have bad accuracy.

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>

This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.

LanguageData.XMonsters_NoBadAccuracy.description:
Carriers of this gene have no bad accuracy.

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>

This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_ExcellentAccuracy.label: excellent shooting accuracy
LanguageData.XMonsters_ExcellentAccuracy.description:
Every professional has his own secrets.

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>

This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_ProfessionalAccuracy.label: professional shooting accuracy
LanguageData.XMonsters_ProfessionalAccuracy.descripti:
Boom! Headshot.

<color=#e5e500>Note:</color>

This gene only works if you have the <color=#b29c2c>Combat</color> <color=#4e591a>Extended</color> mod installed.
